articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Vietnam Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Vietnam Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Vietnam Ministry of Public Security headed by its Minister Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 The head of the delegation asked Kim Yong Nam to convey the greetings of General Secretary Nong Duc Manh to General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam deeply thanked for this and requested him to convey the regards of Kim Jong Il to Nong Duc Manh. 
					
					 The head of the delegation said that while staying in the DPRK the delegation witnessed the successes achieved by the Korean people in the socialist construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung would grow stronger. 
					
					 Present there were Sin Il Nam, vice-minister of People's Security of the DPRK, and Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of DPRK and Vietnam Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of DPRK and Vietnam Held
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security and the Vietnam Ministry of Public Security were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 Present there were members of the delegation of the Ministry of People's Security headed by its Minister Ju Sang Song from the DPRK side and members of the Vietnam delegation headed by Minister of Public Security Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, and Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Van Cu from the Vietnam side.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting exchange and cooperation between the security organs of the two countries and a series of matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Agreement on Mutual Cooperation Signed between Ministries of DPRK and Vietnam
articles.content:
Agreement on Mutual Cooperation Signed between Ministries of DPRK and Vietnam
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- An agreement on mutual cooperation between the DPRK Ministry of People's Security and the Vietnam Ministry of Public Security was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Minister of People's Security Ju Sang Song and other officials of the ministry from the DPRK side and members of the delegation of the Vietnam Ministry of Public Security headed by its Minister Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, and Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Van Cu from the Vietnam side.
					
					 It was signed by Ju Sang Song and Le Hong Anh.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnam Minister of Public Security
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnam Minister of Public Security
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Vietnam Minister of Public Security Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam now on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Le Hong Anh today.

articles.title: British Figure Arrives
articles.content:
British Figure Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here by plane today.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Gives Briefing
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Gives Briefing
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano gave a briefing at his embassy on Tuesday on the occasion of the 140th anniversary of the start of the war for independence by the Cuban people.
					 Present there were members of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee, media persons in Pyongyang and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador referred to the international solidarity movement now under way for the release of five Cuban patriots detained in the U.S. He informed the participants of the struggle of the Cuban people to put an end to the U.S. moves of economic blockade against Cuba and efforts of the party, government and people of Cuba to clear away the disasters caused by the recent hurricane.
					
					 Then he answered questions put by journalists.

articles.title: Egyptian Military Attache Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Egyptian Military Attache Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Ahmed Abo Seri Auf Mohamed, military attache of the Egyptian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Tuesday on the occasion of the day of the Egyptian army.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of the embassies here.
					
					 On hand were Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Monument to Party Founding Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Monument to Party Founding Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Monument to Party Founding showing the great history and tradition of the Workers' Party of Korea has drawn at least 4. 2 million visitors over the last 13 years since it was opened to the public. They include more than 200,000 overseas compatriots and foreign friends. 
					 A daily average of more than 2,000 servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people of all strata, overseas compatriots and foreign friends are visiting it on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the WPK. 
					
					 After being briefed on the monument, officials of the party, army and state, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA, officials of organs at different levels, working people and schoolchildren look back with deep emotion on the road of struggle covered by the WPK which remains shining with victory and glory thanks to the peerlessly great men who made a new history of building a revolutionary party and developed the WPK into a mass political organization of Juche type and an invincible party on the basis of the outstanding idea and with dynamic leadership.

articles.title: Dancing Art of Koguryo
articles.content:
Dancing Art of Koguryo
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The dancing art was on a high level in Koguryo (277 B.C. - 668 A.D.) which demonstrated its grandeur as a great power in the east.
					 Dances reflecting the patriotic ideological sentiments and actual life of the people were widely created and disseminated in Koguryo.
					
					 In those days the distinction between folk and palace dances became clear and the dances were professionalized and their styles diversified.
					
					 Predominant in the dancing art were military dances full of vigor and spirit which represented the patriotism of the people.
					
					 The military dances "Long Sword Dance", "Bow Dance" and "Armor Dance" well depicted the spirit of worshipping military arts of the Koguryo people regarding national defense as their most honorable duty.
					
					 The military dances of Koguryo had a great influence on the development of the dances of the country for their popular character and high artistry.
					
					 A lot of folk dances were created in Koguryo, which dealt with the sentiments and productive activities of the working people.
					
					 Such dances as "Drum Dance" and "Janggo Dance" truthfully depicted the talent and life of the Koguryo people.
					
					   And "Masque Dance" and "Masque Game" exposed the features of the time in the feudal society and bitterly satirized the anti-popular and corrupt life of the exploiter classes.
					
					 The dances in those days were diverse in style, which included solo, duet and group dances, and well showed the characteristics of the Korean dances in which the movement of arms overwhelmed that of feet.
					
					 The dances of Koguryo powerfully stimulated the development of the dancing art in the feudal age and made their way to the neighboring countries.
					
					 It is a precious heritage of the country which typifies the peculiar features of the national dance.

articles.title: Koreans Hold Higher Banner of Juche
articles.content:
Koreans Hold Higher Banner of Juche
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people are expediting the grand march to achieve the final victory in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful country, holding ever higher the banner of Juche.
					They, with a firm faith that the Juche idea is the life-line of man-centered socialism and the source of invincible strength, are implementing the Party's lines and policies to the letter in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					Unfathomably grave were the economic difficulties the DPRK had undergone in recent years.
					
					They, however, withstood all ordeals and difficulties with firm trust in the Party's lines and policies and in their strength.
					
					They have carried on such gigantic nature-remaking projects as large scale land re-zoning and waterway construction and erected many monumental edifices including modern factories and production bases in different places of the country, thus opening up a prospect for a new leap in the building of an economic power.
					
					The Party's line on giving priority to ideology, arms and science and technology has been embodied in all fields of the revolution and construction and splendid successes have been made in the implementation of the Party's policies of bringing about drastic changes in agriculture and light industry. This stark reality clearly shows how strong are the will of the Korean army and people to implement the Party's policies to the letter and their revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					The Korean people are defending firmly the socialist ideological position and mode of life.
					
					They have armed themselves solidly with the great Juche idea and keenly realized the superiority of socialism, standing over the grave ordeals of history. They thus have their hearts filled with the faith that their leader, ideology, cause and system are excellent.
					
					They live and work, helping each other and leading each other forward, full of confidence in and great hope for the future under the collectivist slogan "One for all and all for one!" This is their lofty spiritual world and fighting trait.
					
					The Korean people will achieve an endless prosperity of the country and nation under the uplifted banner of independence.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Military Expansion under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Military Expansion under Fire 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Japan Ministry of Defense reportedly decided to reinforce the analyzing mechanism of the intelligence headquarters in charge of Africa from April of next year in a bid to increase the capability for gathering information on the African region. Timed to coincide with this, Japan is becoming vociferous about the exercise of its "right to collective self-defense".
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' assertion is, in a nutshell, intended to escalate their moves for overseas expansion and it is beyond doubt that this measure would give momentum to their military intrusion into the African countries.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the Japanese reactionaries are going to allow the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) to exercise the above-said right.
					
					 If the SDF is allowed to exercise such right, it will dispatch its troops to different parts of the world under the pretext of "UN peace keeping operations" to legally conduct its military actions for aggression. This will lead to totally destroying the institutional mechanism in terms of the Japanese legislation banning the SDF's participation in overseas military operations.
					
					 The aim sought by them through this is to legalize the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and thus let the SDF hurl its troops to any part of the world in real earnest and undertake military operations for aggression. 
					
					 It is a hard fact that the military strategy of Japan is completely turning into a strategy for preemptive attack from that for "exclusive defence" and the sphere of its military operations is extending to the Asia-Pacific region and to the world-wide scale from its vicinity. The above-said measures taken by the Japan Ministry of Defense are aimed at carrying out its scenario for escalating overseas aggression worldwide.
					
					 Japan is revealing its true colors as a war state and war-like hegemonic forces keen to conquer the world after throwing away the signboard of "pacifist state" it has put up for more than half a century since the end of the war.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to face up to the reality and stop at once its moves for military expansion overseas.

articles.title: Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
articles.content:
Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's intensified fascist suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces is intolerable as it is a blatant challenge to the DPRK and a treacherous and anti-reunification act of going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification towards independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It is a totally far-fetched assertion and a product of the fascist plot to eliminate the patriotic organizations for the reunification movement that the Lee clique is branding the just activities of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration as "a violation of the National Security Law," the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is preposterous and sheer sophism intended to hatch a plot for the Lee clique to claim that the reunification movement was waged by the solidarity at the "instruction of the north".
					
					 Serious hurdles are lying in the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the inter-Korean relations are being brought back to the past era of acute confrontation due to the Lee clique's treacherous and anti-reunification stand and moves. 
					
					 The Lee clique is the anti-reunification forces which can never be pardoned as it sells off the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation to outside forces in a bid to gratify its wild ambition to stay in power, drops a check-bar on the efforts to achieve national reunification vital to the destiny of the compatriots and runs amuck to crack down upon the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					 The Lee clique should face up to the trend of the June 15 era of reunification and immediately stop the fascist suppression of the reunification movement organizations and release those who were unreasonably arrested.

articles.title: Tightening "Alliance" with Foreign Forces Branded as Treachery
articles.content:
Tightening "Alliance" with Foreign Forces Branded as Treachery
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is putting spurs to tightening "alliance" with foreign forces while putting them above fellow countrymen. This can never be pardoned as it is a traitorous crime going against the trend of the times toward national independence and peace and reunification of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The moves for tightening "alliance" with the U.S. are a traitorous act diametrically running counter to the efforts for establishing sovereignty of the nation, an act of swimming against history and the trend of the times toward independent reunification and anti-peace moves increasing danger of war, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is working hard to shoulder increased share of the cost for keeping the U.S. imperialist aggression troops in south Korea and bring benefit to them while opposing "reduction" of the troops.
					
					 The Lee group is imploring the U.S. troops for permanent stay in south Korea under the pretence of tightened "alliance" while clinging to the coattail of the U.S. This is very shameful treachery.
					
					 The "alliance" with the U.S. means "alliance for war." The Lee group is militarily cooperating with the U.S. which is watching for every chance for invading the DPRK, and further strengthening collusion with it. It is as clear as noonday that such reckless behavior would escalate military confrontation and tension and increase danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group will meet only destruction if it continues to opt for cooperation with foreign forces and dependence on them while antagonizing the fellow countrymen, obsessed with sycophancy towards the U.S. and treachery.

articles.title: "National Intelligence Service" in S. Korea Urged to Repent of Its Outbursts and Apologize for Them
articles.content:
NIS Urged to Repent of Its Outbursts and Apologize for Them
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on Oct. 2 titled "National Intelligence Service preoccupied with anachronistic dream should repent of its outbursts and apologize for them."
					 The statement recalled that on Oct. 1 when a lawmaker from the Democratic Labor Party demanded a stop to the suppression of the progressive organizations, the second assistant director of the service did not hesitate to bluster that "the society cannot advance even a step without eliminating the leftist forces."
					
					 This shows what extent the moves of the Lee group of traitors have reached to revive fascist dictatorship, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 Lurking behind the recent crackdown upon the above-said organizations with the mobilization of all security forces is a politically motivated scenario of the Lee group to maintain its pro- big business and undemocratic regime. 
					
					 We vehemently denounce the service's Cold War-minded way of thinking and will join all the people in the struggle against the "government's" suppression under the pretext of "security" and get the NSL, an evil law of the times, repealed without fail.

articles.title: Conservative Paper's Biased Reporting Flayed
articles.content:
Conservative Paper's Biased Reporting Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 3 condemning a conservative newspaper for releasing false reports in a bid to agitate the suppression of a progressive organization. 
					 Speakers at the press conference accused Dong-A Ilbo of releasing the malignant misinformation on October 2 that "the said solidarity ran a nursery called 'June 15 playing room' to teach children of its members" and "there is the sign of the efforts to implant the Juche idea even into the minds of children." 
					
					 They continued:
					
					 The solidarity provided those mothers who had no place where their children might be taken care of with a "June 15 room for children" in its office in March last year. It is, indeed, the height of sarcasm that Dong-A Ilbo claimed that this was a nursery modeled after the north's nursing facilities.
					
					 Noting with indignation that the conservative paper wantonly violated the rights of the families of those who fell victim to the "National Security Law" by spreading misinformation, they declared they would take a strong legal counter-action against Dong-A Ilbo unless it makes an apology for its biased reporting. 
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the above-mentioned families handed a letter of protest to Dong-A Ilbo.

articles.title: First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Oct. 4 under the sponsorship of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on the occasion of the first anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration. 
					 Present there were members of organizations of the committee in different fields and its regional headquarters and figures of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Reunification of the Country, the south Korean Federation of Women's Organizations and other organizations of different circles and bereaved families of democratic martyrs. They were also attended by members of the 6th- term vanguard for reunification of the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea. 
					
					 Speakers at one of the events condemned the Lee Myung Bak "government" for unhesitatingly perpetrating such anti-reunification acts as totally blocking the implementation of the historic declarations and bedeviling the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 They stressed that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration belong to the 70 million fellow countrymen and they should be, therefore, implemented without fail. 
					
					 A resolution read out there urged the "government" to respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its action programme, and opt to implement them, though belatedly. 
					
					 Then followed a photo exhibition and an art performance.
					
					 Meanwhile, a rally and an art performance of youth and students to mark the first anniversary of the October 4 declaration were held in Phaju on the same day under the sponsorship of the Headquarters of Youth and Students of the committee. 
					
					 A resolution read out at the rally noted that youth and students would wage a positive mass movement to assail the Lee Myung Bak group for escalating its moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen while totally negating the historic declarations.

articles.title: Singaporean President Expresses Hope for Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
Singaporean President Expresses Hope for Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Singaporean President S.R. Nathan met the DPRK ambassador to his country who paid a farewell call on him on Sept. 30.
					 The president said that the Korean people have turned their country into a powerful nation overcoming a lot of obstacles and difficulties in the past under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that by accessing to the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia the DPRK has contributed to developing the relations with the ASEAN member states and Singapore and promoting the stability in Southeast Asia.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the friendly relations between the two countries have grown stronger in recent years, the president expressed hope that the reunification of Korea would be achieved as early as possible.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Ecuador, a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Bulgaria and a film show, a friendly meeting and an art performance took place in Laos in the period from Sept. 26 to 30 to mark the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great men, photos showing their immortal exploits, books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handicrafts reflecting the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the WPK serves as a great model of the world revolutionary parties and a beacon indicating a clear way of building socialism for the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in the party building.
					
					 Though the President passed away, the WPK remains an invincible party thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has creditably carried forward his cause, the chairman stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Samokov City Assembly of Bulgaria and its deputy mayor said that they were pleased to see the above-said exhibition opened in their city and expressed the belief that the exhibition would provide an opportunity of boosting the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The manager of the Laos-Korea Tin Company, after watching a film showing the might of the single-minded unity of the Korean people, praised the WPK for having not only achieved great successes in its work for the prosperity and development of the country and the promotion of the well-being of the people but made a great contribution to the human cause of independence under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the last period.

articles.title: Struggle for Resignation of Sycophantic and Treacherous Regime of S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Resignation of Sycophantic and Treacherous Regime of S. Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany on Oct. 4 issued an appeal titled "Let us turn out in the nationwide struggle to force the sycophantic and treacherous regime to resign under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration."
					 The appeal said that the above-said declarations mean an independent declaration of the nation and a declaration on peaceful reunification as they call for independently and peacefully carving out the Korean nation's destiny by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak is trying to check the movement for reunification of national historic significance, a movement for putting an end to the antagonism and confrontation, leftovers of the ghost in the era of the Cold War, and achieving independence, peace and prosperity common to the nation through reconciliation and confidence, the appeal said, adding that his moves against the June 15 and October 4 declarations are touching off bitter anger among all compatriots. 
					
					 To eliminate the sycophantic and treacherous forces keen to violate and stamp out the dignity of the Korean nation represents the spirit prevailing in the June 15 era of reunification as it is the task the fulfillment of which brooks not a moment's delay, the appeal said.
					
					  We can never remain an onlooker to Lee's acts against reunification, the appeal noted, calling upon all the Koreans to unite under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and turn out in the nationwide struggle to force the above-said regime to step down by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente del ministro de Seguridad de Vietnam
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente del ministro de Seguridad de Vietnam
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y ministro de Seguridad Publica de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, Le Hong Anh, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 7 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece encuentro de informacion
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece encuentro de informacion
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 140o aniversario del comienzo de la guerra independentista del pueblo cubano, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ofrecio el dia 7 en su sede diplomatica un encuentro de informacion. 
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, los reporteros de los periodicos y la agencia noticiera en esta capital y los miembros de la embajada cubana. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el embajador cubano se refirio al movimiento solidario internacional que se desarrolla para la liberacion de los cinco patriotas cubanos encarcelados en Estados Unidos e informo sobre la lucha del pueblo cubano por acabar con el bloqueo economico impuesto por este imperio y sobre la lucha del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de su pais por reparar los danos de los tifones ocurridos recientemente.
					
					Acto seguido, el respondio a las preguntas de los  reporteros.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ratifica su denuncia a represion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ratifica su denuncia a represion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- La desesperada represion fascista de la banda de Lee Myung Bak contra las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion no puede ser perdonada en ningun caso porque deviene desafio frontal a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y acto criminal antinacional que contraviene a la corriente de la epoca del 15 de Junio hacia la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					En particular, esa horda acosa salvajemente a la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte incriminando sus justas actividades para la reintegracion territorial del pais bajo pretexto de que ellas violan la "ley de seguridad" y se libran segun las "instrucciones del Norte de Corea".
					
					Esto deviene una insistencia totalmente absurda y el producto del complot fascista para aniquilar a esa entidad del movimiento patriotico por la reunificacion.
					
					Debido a la posicion y las maniobras antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la horda de Lee, se crean graves obstaculos en el camino por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y regresan a la epoca de agudo enfrentamiento del pasado las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Nunca seran perdonadas estas fuerzas antipaticas con la reunificacion que a fin de satisfacer su ambicion por el poder, venden a las fuerzas foraneas la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion, obstaculizan la reunificacion de la patria, problema vital para el destino nacional, y se enfrascan en la represion contra las fuerzas patrioticas pro- reunificacion.
					
					Al ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio, Lee Myung Bak y sus compinches deben abandonar de inmediato su campana represiva contra las entidades partidarias de la reunificacion y poner en libertad ahora mismo a todas las personas injustamente detenidas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia expansion militarista de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia expansion militarista de Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun trascendidos, el Ministerio de Defensa de Japon decidio fortalecer el sector de analisis de la oficina de informacion encargada de Africa desde abril del ano que viene para elevar la capacidad de coleccion de informacion sobre este continente y al mismo tiempo este pais isleno arma bulla del ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva".
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 7 y continua:
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses pretenden hacer abiertas sus maniobras de expansion a ultramar.
					
					  Es indudable que con la presente medida del ministerio de defensa se fortalecera la penetracion militar de los reaccionarios japoneses en los paises africanos.
					
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que ellos intentan permitir el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" de las "fuerzas de autodefensa".
					
					  De hacerse realidad esta intencion, las "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon pueden enviar sus efectivos a todas partes del mundo con el rotulo de "actividades de mantenimiento de la paz de la ONU" y librar legalmente las acciones militares agresivas. Esto desvirtua el aparato legal de Japon que prohibe la participacion de las "fuerzas de autodefensa" en las operaciones militares ultramarinas.
					
					  Lo que persiguen ellos es legalizar el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" que posibilita enviar sin restriccion alguna sus "fuerzas de autodefensa" a cualquier region del mundo a fin de desplegar la operacion militar agresiva.
					
					  Es obvio que la estrategia militar de Japon paso de la "defensa exclusiva" a la ofensiva preventiva y la esfera de operacion militar se extiende de los alrededores de Japon a la region de Asia-Pacifico y las demas regiones del mundo. El fortalecimiento de la capacidad de coleccion de informacion y la medida del ministerio de defensa de Japon para despachar las "fuerzas de autodefensa" son la medida practica para extender al ambito mundial su accion de agresion a ultramar.
					
					  Japon abandono el rotulo de "estado pacifico" que  portaba mas de medio siglo de la postguerra y asi puso al desnudo su naturaleza de pais belico y de fuerzas dominacionistas belicas que suenan con la conquista del mundo.
					
					  Japon debe justipreciar la realidad de hoy y poner inmediatamente fin a las maniobras de expansion militarista a ultramar.
